mapper.select: select distinct showtimes_detail.id,t.id as theaterId,s.dayshowtimes as dayshowtimes, t.name as theaterName, l.name as locationName from showtimes_detail join location l on showtimes_detail.location_id = l.id join movie m on showtimes_detail.movie_id = m.id join showtimes s on showtimes_detail.showtimes_id = s.id join theater t on showtimes_detail.theater_id = t.id where l.id = #{location} and s.dayshowtimes = #{date}
select value as name from timepick;
